channel.title: [317][PI] Torva armour displaying wierd
channel.description:
Hello all,
On my server when I or my other players wear Torva armour for some reason the game thinks that it is a weapon opposed to armour. How can I fix this and is this because of the client or the server?
Thanks loads, - Gergy

item.title: [317][PI] Torva armour displaying wierd
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

Hm go into data folder and see if there is “EquipmentEditor” a jar file. use that it is really simple you will understand if you have it. if Not then go into ItemAssistant.java and you should see like

case XXX:
itemSlot X;

figure out the itemslots they are like
helm=1
wep=2
something like that

Read full topic
